mapper.select: SELECT c.complaint_no AS complaintNo, c.title, c.category, c.status, c.created_date AS createdDate, COUNT(pl.complaint_no) AS likeCount FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN post_like pl ON c.complaint_no = pl.complaint_no GROUP BY c.complaint_no, c.title, c.category, c.status, c.created_date ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'RECEIVED') AS received, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'IN_PROGRESS') AS processing, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'COMPLETED') AS completed FROM complaint
